meta.title: Sapna Nand - Professional Resume
meta.description: Dedicated pharmaceutical professional with 6+ years of experience in team leadership, customer service, and pharmacy operations

hero.name: Sapna Nand
hero.title: Team Leader | Pharmaceutical Commercial Assistant
hero.description: Dedicated pharmaceutical professional with 6+ years of experience in team leadership, customer service, and pharmacy operations.

leadership.title: Team Leadership & Collaboration
leadership.description: Test. Over the past five years, I've worked hand-in-hand with the pharmacy owner to guide staffing decisions, optimize workflows, and mentor new interns. I focus on creating clear training paths and a supportive environment, helping our smaller team maintain the stability and expertise we need.

customer.title: Customer Engagement & Results
customer.description: I consult with customers daily, providing personalized advice and building trust through reliable, informed service. By combining operational know-how with hands-on guidance, I help our pharmacy deliver consistent results and adapt smoothly to evolving challenges.

operational.title: Operational Expertise
operational.description: With six years in pharmacy operations—including magistral formulations, inventory management, ordering, and taxation—I've developed a deep, practical understanding of every process. Starting as an intern and advancing to a PKA role, I've built a solid foundation that ensures our pharmacy runs efficiently day to day.

experience.description: Leading pharmaceutical operations including magistral formulations, inventory management, customer consultation, and team coordination. Responsible for training new staff, optimizing workflows, and ensuring regulatory compliance in all pharmacy operations.

vocational.title: Vocational Training - Pharmacy Employee/Assistant
vocational.description: During my studies, I acquired a solid foundation in pharmacy science, botanical therapeutics, core chemistry principles, nutrition and health science, cosmetic formulation, hands-on laboratory techniques, and essential accounting practices.

pka.title: PKA Training
pka.description: During my pharmacy technician (PKA) training, I became familiar with daily pharmacy operations—including inventory management, order processing, prescription handling, customer consultation, and administrative tasks.

cta.title: Let's Connect
cta.description: Interested in hands-on procurement expertise, sales operations, or customer relationship management? I'd love to discuss how my practical experience in pharmaceutical retail and team coordination can contribute to your organization.
